rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious open area welcoming guests; includes integrated home theater system. Features comfortable seating, ambient lighting, and a central console for audio-visual systems.

vastu.notes: Maintains balance by ensuring the entrance faces east for prosperity.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped modern kitchen with Mediterranean styling; includes a breakfast nook adjacent to an open area.

vastu.notes: Placed in the south to harness natural light and maintain balance.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional guest bathroom with built-in storage. Complements the overall aesthetic of the apartment.

vastu.notes: Positioned to encourage clarity and refreshment.

rooms.name: Poolside Patio/Outdoor Entertainment Area
rooms.description: Open space adjacent to the swimming pool area. Equipped with Mediterranean-style seating, ambient lighting, and an outdoor kitchen for summer entertaining.

vastu.notes: Aligns with Vastu by supporting relaxation and social gatherings.

openings.description: Mediterranean-styled entrance door with arched top and decorative detailing.

vastu.notes: Provides a strong and welcoming entryway.

openings.description: Opens from the living room to the balcony area, ensuring seamless indoor-outdoor transition.
Provides access from the ground floor bedroom to a spacious balcony.

additional_features.name: Swimming Pool
additional_features.description: A luxurious swimming pool integrated into the landscape design with Mediterranean features. Offers privacy and relaxation.

additional_features.name: Home Theater
additional_features.description: A dedicated media room within the living space with soundproof walls and premium audio-visual equipment.

additional_features.name: Balconies
additional_features.description: Each bedroom is equipped with its own spacious balcony offering a view of the surroundings, ensuring privacy and natural ventilation.

vastu.notes: Balconies are positioned to maximize exposure to sunlight while maintaining privacy.
